>>===== MODE =====>>
citation

>>===== RESULT =====>>

David Johnson

xx
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" version="1.0">
  <info>
    <title/>
    <id/>
    <updated>2016-06-21T07:13:58+00:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="&#x0A;">
      <names variable="author">
		<name et-al-min="8" />
	    <substitute>
		  <names variable="editor" />
		  <text variable="title" />
		  <text value="xx" />
		</substitute>
	  </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
